page.title: 13NEWSTEAD TRADING ESTATE
page.content: The Michelin Tyre Company is a drawing office. It has been there 6 years and has 120 workers, mostly local, but some are French or Scottish. They do not export. The workers are skilled and do not do shift or piece work. Some think that the building may close and move to Stoke. Some people commented on the industrial troubles that had happened. Remploy Ltd. has 135 workers from Chell, Cheadle and Leek and has been there 16 years. There are 93 factories. All the factory workers are disabled, but the office staff are able bodied. Clare Steel Constructions make electrical items. The firm has been there 10 years and they have about 100 workers, mostly local. This is the only firm and it does not export. There are erectors, moulders, painters and shot blasters.The skilled workers do not do shift or piece work.
